doc:
Fuzzy Knight https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fuzzy_Knight 0 John Forrest "Fuzzy" Knight (May 9, 1901 – February 23, 1976) was an American film and television actor. He was also a singer, especially in his early career. He appeared in more than 180 films between 1928 and 1967, usually as a cowboy hero's comic sidekick. John_Forrest_"_Fuzzy_"_Knight ( May_9_,_1901 – February_23_,_1976 ) was an_American_film_and_television_actor . He was also a_singer , especially in his_early_career . He appeared in more_than_180_films between 1928_and_1967 , usually as a_cowboy_hero 's_comic_sidekick .
